alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 2:11PM MST until January 17 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 PM and 7 PM between 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Davenport, Airway Heights, Worley, Fruitland, Tiger, Cheney, Downtown Spokane, Chewelah, Orin-Rice Road, Rockford, Newport, Hayden, Kettle Falls, Colville, Metaline Falls, Metaline, Northport, Spokane Valley, Springdale-Hunters Road, Post Falls, Ione, Fairfield, Deer Park, Coeur d`Alene, and Flowery Trail Road. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates of near an inch per hour are expected through late this afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
